    • signUp

      public void signUp(javafx.event.ActionEvent ae)
      Handles the sign-up process for a new user. This method validates the input email, password, and username using corresponding validators: EmailValidator, PasswordValidator, and UsernameValidator. It creates tasks for each validation using Callable interface and submits them to an ExecutorService. Once the validation tasks are completed, it retrieves the validation results. If all validations pass, it creates a new user object with the provided credentials and attempts to add it to the database using UserModel. If the user is successfully added, it transitions to the menu mode interface with the new user. If any validation fails or an exception occurs during the sign-up process, appropriate error messages are displayed. Additionally, if a runtime error related to RTTI (Run-Time Type Identification) occurs during the execution of validation tasks, it prints the stack trace and displays the corresponding error message. Finally, the executor service is shut down.
      Parameters:
      ae - the ActionEvent representing the action event that triggered this method.
